nodes.bodyText: Should the defaults be increased?  This question is for both Anil & @rjeberhard

Yes, I agree that defaults should be increased at least for cpu request. With cpu request of "100m", JVM uses "defNew" and "SerialOld" GC (single threaded). Even when I configured JVM to use G1 GC, JVM ran with a parallel GC but with only one GC thread. However, I'm not aware of reason for previous default value of "100m". I wanted to get @rjeberhard Ryan's thoughts on the default values and I can increase them accordingly.
